DOC.brief_summary: The purpose multi-center prospective study evaluate diagnostic performance S-Shearwave , newly develop ultrasound shear wave elastography , assessment hepatic fibrosis .
DOC.criteria: Patients chronic liver disease cirrhosis , livingdonor candidate liver transplantation , volunteer Signed informed consent Acute hepatitis bile duct obstruction Serum ALT > 5 time upper limit normal within 3 month s/p Rt . hemihepatectomy s/p liver transplantation Large mass infiltrative lesion right lobe liver
